title: Rise of the Elite
description: A manâ€™s character is best defined by the way he handles power and the way he handles loss. Tom Marshall understood both. After what seems like a normal accident, a young businessman begins to develop extraordinary abilities, and the government must rush to preserve this top secret finding and keep it out of the public eye before it becomes a global news story. But even for senior government agent, Tom Marshall, this task becomes vigorous and unpredictable. He must seize the opportunity to once again prove himself when his life becomes entangled with others who are suddenly faced with great power and great loss. When another elite rises, Tom must work fast to keep himself, the elite, and the government secret safe.
author: Steve Dapper
